label: specifiedProductCertificate
comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.

domainIncludes.comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.
Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.
